displayName.text: Style Made Simple - Personal Stylist, Image Consultant & Shopper

formattedAddress: 58 E 11th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Style Made Simple - Personal Stylist, Image Consultant & Shopper

adrFormatAddress: 58 E 11th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: I reached out to Allison and her team to help me find a dress for my son's Bar Mitzvah.  Due to the pandemic I did not want to go to stores and spend hours trying on clothes.  Allison did such an amazing job making the process so easy.  She was so detailed in understanding exactly what I was looking for, that the first dress she suggested was the one I purchased!  She found me the perfect dress for the occasion, and I felt amazing wearing it.  Thank you so much Allison...you are so talented and I can't wait to work with you again!!!

originalText.text:
Allison and her expertise have been instrumental in elevating my entire image. Since I've been working with her, my confidence has grown 10X. I simply feel fabulous when I walk out in her curated outfits.
She is accessible, reliable, and makes the process as stress-free as possible! Highly recommend Style Made Simple!

originalText.text: I've been working with Allison for six years. She has assisted me in editing my closet, find the perfect outfit for any/all occasions and helped me up my style game! She is a warm, generous and kind person -- a delight to be around!

text.text: I've been working with Allison for six years. She has assisted me in editing my closet, find the perfect outfit for any/all occasions and helped me up my style game! She is a warm, generous and kind person -- a delight to be around!

originalText.text: Allison is the best. She really gets to know you and your life style and then helps you craft a look that works for you.  She does a great job of helping you build a wardrobe that you can style up or style down depending on your mood.  I've also saved so much time and money since I started working with her.  I used to buy things and never wear them. I also used to spend hours shopping and come away empty handed.  Now, I just look forward to my days shopping with her all year long. It is simply a lot of fun. She had a great sense of humor and makes the whole process enjoyable. I also really appreciate that doesn't push any sales.  She is mindful of your overall wardrobe and does a great job of picking pieces that work with what you already own.  She's just fantastic.  She takes all the effort out of getting dressed!
